data.author: Albert Einstein
data.quote: Anyone who has never made a mistake has never tried anything new.

data.author: Winston Churchill
data.quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.

data.author: Winston Churchill
data.quote: The pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity. The optimist sees opportunity in every difficulty.

data.author: Will Rogers
data.quote: Don’t Let Yesterday Take Up Too Much Of Today.

data.author: Vince Lombardi
data.quote: It’s Not Whether You Get Knocked Down, It’s Whether You Get Up.

data.author: Steve Jobs
data.quote: If You Are Working On Something That You Really Care About, You Don’t Have To Be Pushed. The Vision Pulls You.

data.author: Maya Angelou
data.quote: We May Encounter Many Defeats But We Must Not Be Defeated.

data.author: Brian Tracy
data.quote: Imagine Your Life Is Perfect In Every Respect; What Would It Look Like?

data.author: Napoleon Hill
data.quote: Whatever the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve.

data.author: Albert Einstein
data.quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.

data.author: Robert Frost
data.quote: Two roads diverged in a wood, and I—I took the one less traveled by, And that has made all the difference.

data.author: Wayne Gretzky
data.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.

data.author: Babe Ruth
data.quote: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.

data.author: Buddha
data.quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.

data.author: Vince Lombardi
data.quote: Winning isn’t everything, but wanting to win is.

data.author: Jim Rohn
data.quote: Either you run the day, or the day runs you.

data.author: Frank Sinatra
data.quote: The best revenge is massive success.

data.author: Anais Nin
data.quote: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage.

data.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
data.quote: Remember no one can make you feel inferior without your consent.

data.author: Theodore Roosevelt
data.quote: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
